channel.title: [317] Rune-X-Scape: Developers Needed
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i.picasion.com/pic39/82723cb790ade14678a81b7a7777190c.gif[/img]
[b]We are currently Searching for Developers to Join the Team! Currently Me & Pepsi
Age: Position applying for: Past work: Experience: Dedication to a project (on a scale of 1 to 10): Skype:
We Currently Have 24-7 Hosting Supported by 123Reg & Domain By GoDaddy & Webclient / download
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r679/haviland66/rxs2222_zps852ba84d.png[/img]
Fixes New v4.0 Cache rune-x-scape Mute system - easy fix but many PI's dont have :S Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker Made client window non resizable fixed remove X dupe method fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours) fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out
Additions Kalphite queen with working animations working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points) working tokul shops kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab quick chat fully working where it doesnt say "0 hans" when you have no task Edgeville home with all alters and shop added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom "combat potion" re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying fully working exp lamps use "agility top" on agility npc's for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets) added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness) added lots of teleports
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r679/haviland66/Untitled_zps39852789.png[/img]
[img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6615/shopsq.png[/img]
Thanks Josh
Skype:haviland41[/b][/center]

item.title: [317] Rune-X-Scape: Developers Needed
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Played RXS a long time ago, a real long ass time ago. No idea if any of you guys are chris that used to own it, if it is then good luck to you. If you’re really struggling, you can PM me for my Skype and I’ll see if I can help out a bit.

item.title: [317] Rune-X-Scape: Developers Needed
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[center]

[b]We are currently Searching for Developers to Join the Team!
Currently Me & Pepsi

Age:
Position applying for:
Past work:
Experience:
Dedication to a project (on a scale of 1 to 10):
Skype:

We Currently Have 24-7 Hosting Supported by 123Reg & Domain By GoDaddy & Webclient / download

rxs2222_zps852ba84d.png762×525

Fixes
New v4.0 Cache rune-x-scape
Mute system - easy fix but many PI’s dont have :S
Zamorak Godwars bosses - animations work so they no longer flicker
Made client window non resizable
fixed remove X dupe method
fixed some memory leak issues (not 100% but is much better) - See printscreen
fixed some of items equiping to wrong slot and showing incorrectly (pvp armours)
fixed the logout glitch at duel arena where it would spam the server when you logged out

Additions
Kalphite queen with working animations
working points system (slayer/pking/boss killing to earn points)
working tokul shops
kill/death ratio with counters in the quest tab
quick chat fully working where it doesnt say “0 hans” when you have no task
Edgeville home with all alters and shop
added working zamorak brews + magic potions and custom “combat potion”
re-coded commands file, added lots of new commands and neatnd the file up however still needs some tidying
fully working exp lamps
use “agility top” on agility npc’s for exp bonuses (can be bought with agility tickets)
added 3 agility courses (gnome, barbarian and wilderness)
added lots of teleports

Untitled_zps39852789.png768×515

Thanks Josh

Skype:haviland41[/b][/center]
